One of four values related to 知识青年: 'yes' if elligible person underwent rustication; 'no' where elligible person did not; 'unknown' where status of elligible persons is unclear. 'NULL' for inelligible persons (foreigners / deceased / born after 1964)
year between 1968-1979 in EDTF; 'NULL' if rustication is either 'no' or 'NULL'; if rustication status is unknown uses approximate and uncertain dates

Person.person_id of related

Relation based on UCREL/USAS semantic classes. Chinese kinship according to extensions proposed by Qian & Piao (2007). By default close friends have intimate asexual relations (S3.2-). Romantic relations are assumed to be sexual (S3.2+). Absent or antipathetic relations are not recorded.
Name of relation in Chinese. '朋友' for close friends (S3.2-). '熟人' as default unspecific relation (S3.1)
Simple kinship term in English ('sister' 'grandfather' …). 'friend' (S3.2-) & 'acquaintance' (S3.1) for non-kinship relations
evidence for this relation either source_id or URL
'ONLINE SOURCE' if source is a URL
